title: Implement fit score drift monitoring and alerting

sections.text: Add automated monitoring to detect model drift in fit score outputs by tracking key distribution and performance metrics (e.g., score distribution shifts, calibration/segment lift on labeled outcomes where available). Define drift thresholds and trigger alerts to Slack/email with links to the affected model version, segment, and time window. Store drift events for later audit and to inform retraining decisions.
